<expression xsi:schemaLocation="http://www.imsglobal.org/xsd/imslorsltitm_v1p0 http://fire.eun.org/lode/imslorsltitm_v1p0.xsd" xmlns="http://www.imsglobal.org/xsd/imslorsltitm_v1p0" xmlns:xsi="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema-instance">

  </identifier>

    <catalog>expression-cmr-id</catalog>

  </identifier>
  <description>
    <facet>
      <vocabularyID>LRE.expressionDescriptionFacetValues</vocabularyID>
      <value>main</value>
    </facet>
    <metadata>
      <schema>http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM</schema>
      <lom xsi:schemaLocation="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/lomv1.0/lomLoose.xsd" xmlns="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM">
        <general>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>oercommons.org</catalog>
            <entry>20101468</entry>
          </identifier>
          <title>
            <string language="en">Science Digest - Episode 1 Sci Fi</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Wissenschaft Auswahl - Episode 1 Sci FI</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Sommaire de la Science - Épisode 1 Sci Fi</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Sumário Da Ciência - Episode 1 Sci Fi</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Raccolta Di Scienza - Episodio 1 Sci Fi</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Αφομοίωση επιστήμης - επεισόδιο 1 FI Sci</string>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Resumen De la Ciencia - Episodio 1 Sci Fi</string>
          </title>
          <description>
            <string language="en">Quirky Science Digest talk show host Mathew Arden interviews science fiction writer Nancy Dryden.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">Science and Technology</string>
          </keyword>
          <language>en</language>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Schrulliger Wissenschaft Auswahlgespräch 
Erscheinenhauptrechner Mathew Arden interviewt Zukunftsromanverfasser 
Nancy Dryden.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">L'hôte bizarre Mathew Arden d'exposition 
d'entretien de sommaire de la Science interviewe l'auteur Nancy Dryden
de la science-fiction.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">O anfitrião quirky Mathew Arden da mostra da 
conversa do sumário da ciência entrevista o escritor Nancy Dryden do
fiction de ciência.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Il calcolatore centrale quirky Mathew Arden di 
esposizione di colloquio della raccolta di scienza intervista il 
produttore Nancy Dryden della fantascienza.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Η ιδιόμορφη συζήτηση αφομοιώσεων επιστήμης εμφανίζει 
στις συνεντεύξεις Mathew Arden ξένιου χ/υ συγγραφέα Νανσύ 
Dryden επιστημονικής φαντασίας.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-es">El ordenador principal quirky Mathew Arden de la 
demostración de la charla del resumen de la ciencia se entrevista con
a programa de escritura Nancy Dryden de la ciencia ficción.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Wissenschaft und Technologie</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">La Science et technologie</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Ciência e tecnologia</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Scienza e tecnologia</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Επιστήμη και τεχνολογία</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Ciencia y tecnología</string>
          </keyword>
        </general>
        <lifeCycle>
          <contribute>
            <role>

        <rights>

            <source>copyrightAndOtherRestrictionsValues</source>
            <value>yes</value>

            <string language="x-t-cc-url">http://creativecommons.org/licenses/by/3.0/</string>

          </description>
        </rights>
      </lom>
    </metadata>
  </description>
